Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the United States Navy did not announce the christening of a ship named "USS Tig Ol Bitties" after an online vote.
Understate: The claim may understate the significance or impact of the naming controversy, as it only briefly mentions it without providing further context or analysis.
Falters at times: The claim falters in providing accurate information about the naming of the ship, as it relies on a satirical source (Duffel Blog) for its information.
